00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "AWSizeB1.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00036 #include "TMPDerivs.hpp"
00037 #include "TMPCommon.hpp"
00038 
00039 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00040 
00041 std::string AWSizeB1::get_name() const
00042   { return "AWSizeB1"; }
00043 
00044 AWSizeB1::~AWSizeB1() {}
00045 
00046 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00047 bool eval( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& A, 
00048            const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& W, 
00049            double& result)
00050 {
00051   const double alpha = det(A);
00052   const double omega = det(W);
00053   const double prod = alpha * omega;
00054   if (AWMetric::invalid_determinant( prod ))
00055     return false;
00056   
00057   result = (alpha - omega);
00058   result *= result;
00059   result /= prod;
00060   return true;
00061 }
00062 
00063 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00064 bool grad( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& A, 
00065            const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& W, 
00066            double& result, 
00067            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& deriv )
00068 {
00069   const double alpha = det(A);
00070   const double omega = det(W);
00071   const double prod = alpha * omega;
00072   if (AWMetric::invalid_determinant( prod ))
00073     return false;
00074 
00075   result = (alpha - omega);
00076   result *= result;
00077   result /= prod;
00078   deriv = transpose_adj(A);
00079   deriv *= (alpha*alpha - omega*omega)/(alpha*prod);
00080   return true;
00081 }
